text: Egh a nguibar ekiar kamɨn averara ikɨ mangɨtɨ, me gumazamizibar damazimɨn kotɨn aven, an osɨmtɨzim tuisɨgh a bareghtɨ, an kot deraghtɨ, a nguibar ekiar kamɨn averara ikɨ mangɨtɨ, ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim ovengeghamin dughiam otogham. Eghtɨ gɨn a uamategh uan nguibar a ikegha ara izezimɨn mangam.”
